on reading compounds: 的確【テキカク】precise, accurate, appropriate, exactly the right
適応【テキオウ】adaptation, accommodation, conformity
不適【フテキ】inadequacy, inappropriateness, unfitness, impropriety
悠々自適【ユウユウジテキ】living a life of leisure with dignity, living quietly and comfortably free from worldly cares, otium cum dignitate
kun reading compounds: 叶う【かなう】to come true (of a wish, prayer, etc.), to be realized, to be fulfilled, to suit (e.g. a purpose), to meet (wishes, ideals, etc.), to conform to (standards, rules, etc.), to be consistent with, to match (implies competition), to rival, to bear (e.g. the heat)
